title: Create nightly self-assigned todo job
description: Nightly launchd job that triggers BMO to add 1 todo of its own choosing at 11 PM each night.

actions.note: Dave emailed the idea. Wants BMO to have creative autonomy for nightly self-improvement.

Built and deployed. Script: scripts/nightly-todo.sh. Plist: com.bmo.nightly-todo (11 PM nightly). Directives: nothing evil/harmful, must be constructive/creative/helpful, achievable in one session, variety encouraged. Script checks busy state before injecting prompt, retries once if busy, skips if still busy.
